claim_card.claim: A falsifiable benchmark protocol is framed as a 'Michelson–Morley for Turbulence' comparing RGP metrics against classical NS methods with pre-registered metrics.
claim_card.test_hook: Pre-register metrics: lead-time, RMSE, energy error, cost, robustness; then run side-by-side comparisons.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Design a falsifiable testbed that compares RGP’s predictive performance against classical NS methods
